name: Fallen London: Tauroktonos
storyline: An ailing professor uncovers a secret beneath a butcher's shop: a forgotten Mithraic temple. Delve into its mysteries, open its great brass door, and lead an expedition of troubled souls along the Devilbone Road.
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for April, 2019. Second entry in the Season of Explorations.
